name: contingency_appraisal_days
title: Within how many days after Acceptance will the Appraisal Contingency be removed?
label: Appraisal Contingency Days
description: This applies because you chose not to waive this contingency.
tips: Consider typical appraisal completion times when setting this deadline. The standard is 17 days.
small_print: The appraisal contingency removal date should allow sufficient time for the appraisal to be completed and reviewed. Confirm with your Lender what their timeline is as far as receiving and reviewing an appraisal report.

contingency_appraisal_days.name: contingency_appraisal_days

suggested.hint: Anything over 21 days may be considered too long and could affect your offer's competitiveness.
